content.rendered:
Milkmind

Milkmind is an education platform that includes mobile and web application for students, tutors, guests and administrators. Key functional areas covered include user accounts, tutor search and booking, video lessons, student learning materials, tutor profiles and ratings, payments, and administrative capabilities.

About

Brand: Milkmind

Location: France

Industry: Education

Budget:: $10,000 – $49,000

Clutch Review: 

5.0
 5/5

Product link: milkmind.com  

Type of software: Web&Mobile App

Scope of work: Back-end, Front-end, UI/UX, Quality Assurance

The education platform will include a mobile application for students. Key functional areas covered include user profiles, quizzes, notes, and user’s score, accounts, tutor search and booking, video lessons, student learning materials, tutor profiles and ratings, payments, and administrative capabilities.

Technologies

Ruby|Ruby on rails

PostgreSQL

Redis

JavaScript

Next.js

Docker

RSpec

SCSS

What our client
wanted

Alexandre Bourgeaux

Founder at Milkmind

Our idea was to create a comprehensive platform for students, with complex functionality and interactions

Challenge

  • The main challenge was to handle complex interactions between users, manage scheduling across time zones, integrate third-party services (like Zoom and Stripe), and incorporate AI elements, all while maintaining high security and user-friendly interfaces for diverse user roles.

Key features

  • Authorization for students
  • The database of all lessons and student's past activities
  • Whiteboard notes
  • AI-powered Quizzes
  • Student's Score
  • Student's Profile
  • Admin’s access and user management

Project Team

Project Team

Diana

Project Manager​

Oleksii

Team Lead

Dmytro

FE developer

Anna

Project Manager​

Pavlo

BE developer

Ievhen

FE developer

Get a quote

Client’s review

Alexandre Bourgeaux

Founder at Milkmind

I am grateful to the team for their really strong work, and for their approach and attention to detail.

5.0
 5/5

Business Value

We have created a comprehensive mobile and web application for students, tutors, guests and administrators;

Fully tested and deployed system;

The app is already attracting users and bringing profit to the company

Let's start. It's easier than you think.

Contact us
Next case
